channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large Deep Potholes at bottom of Hill, dangerous for bikes, 9th April
item.description:
I was cycling through here and this pothole nearly took me off my bike. Really deep and dangerous, there is then a further 3 also quite large potholes next to this one

Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Another ALDI trolley.

item.title: Large potholes, 9th April
item.description:
Large potholes which have been marked up but not filled. Been in same condition a week and big enough to cause significant vehicle damage. Should be a priority
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Lane
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, 9th April
item.description:
Deep pothole in centre line of Cleevelands drive o/s no 2

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cleevelands Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bushes growing across the road, 9th April
item.description:
The bushes growing across the road have been untended to for at least 2 years. They are obstructing the view od the road, making it a blind bend. Due to cars parked on the other side of the road, this is especially dangerous when turning into the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on the north carriage way (heading towards Birdlip), 8th April
item.description:
Deep pothole close to The Landers sign.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Clovelly Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole near junction, 8th April
item.description:
Pothole is on the bend and people are swerving into the other carriage way. The hole is between the Great Witcombe turning and the pavement starting on the south side carriage way (heading towards Brockworth). Rough What 3 Words reference; https://w3w.co/printing.budgeted.history
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Clovelly Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Hedge, 8th April
item.description:
Forced left. fell in road when caught walking stick on curb. Hedge takes up more than half of pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Mary Rose Avenue, Gloucester

item.title: Drain blocked, 9th April
item.description:
Totally blocked, seen road sweeper along here several times but they don’t stop to sort drains. Floods so badly you can cross here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 325 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Horsefair street between church and Croft Drive, 8th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes and large areas of road degradation. This was reported as repaired, but lots of damaged road still needs repairing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Horsefair Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Overhanging branch, 8th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shrublands Leckhampton Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Long Potholes, 8th April
item.description:
These are multiple long potholes where old foxes have broke up on the side of the road down the hill. Tbh if a gang is going out they might as well assess the whole hill as there are quite a few dotted along the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
